alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Gove; Rawlins; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 24 at 3:09AM CDT until July 25 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ TO 8 PM MDT /9 PM CDT/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 105 expected. * WHERE...In Kansas, Rawlins, Decatur, Sheridan and Gove Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...From noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ to 8 PM MDT /9 PM CDT/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures combined with the humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest heat index values will occur around 4 PM CDT.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, limit time in the sun, check up on relatives and neighbors, and take frequent breaks if working outside. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
